movies.title: Corto Maltese: La cour secrète des Arcanes
movies.plot: At the end of 1918 while civil war is raging on in Russia, antagonism is slowly spreading to the East, between the Oural mountains and Shanghai. Stuck between a desire to save what's left of the great Imperial Russia, and starting from a clean slate, old generals, secret organizations, and mercenaries attracted by gold, struggle to take advantage of the events. As Corto Maltese returns to Shanghai, he barely gets time to cross paths with his old friend/nemesis Raspoutine, and escape a murder attempt before being contacted by members of a Chinese secret organization called "The Red Lanterns". In the heart of violent Mandchourian horizons, Corto and Raspoutine launch themselves into a fabulous treasure hunt, following the tracks of the mysterious armor-plated train of Koltchak. A steel monster spiked with canons and machine guns, this trains protects the counter-revolutionaries gold, traveling through Mongolia, and! Mandchouria. While following the bloody trail of this doomed train, ...
movies.simplePlot: In 1918, civil wars are tearing Russia and China apart. Laconic adventurer Corto Maltese is hired by a Chinese secret society to capture a train that's taking Tzar's gold abroad. His friend Rasputin joins him, but only hell awaits them.

biography.bio: Richard Berry was born on July 31, 1950 in Paris, France as Richard Élie Benguigui. He is an actor and writer, known for L'immortel (2010), Ruby & Quentin (2003) and The Valet (2006). He has been married to Pascale Louange since September 17, 2016. They have one child. He was previously married to Jessica Forde and Jeane Manson.
biography.name: Richard Berry

biography.bio: Patrick Bouchitey was born on August 11, 1946 in Plancher-les-Mines, Haute-Saône, France. He is an actor and writer, known for La meilleure façon de marcher (1976), Lune froide (1991) and La tête en friche (2010).
biography.name: Patrick Bouchitey

biography.bio: Barbara Schulz was born on May 25, 1972 in Bordeaux, France. She is an actress and production manager, known for French Kiss (1995), Toutes les filles sont folles (2003) and La dilettante (1999).
biography.name: Barbara Schulz

biography.bio: Marie Trintignant died tragically on the 1st of August, 2003 from a cerebral edema in Neuilly-sur-Seine near Paris, France, following a violent fight with her boyfriend, Bertrand Cantat, lead singer in the French rock band, Noir Désir. She was just finishing filming a TV movie about Colette, directed by her mother. Born into show business, she made her first screen appearance when she was just four-years-old but her breakthrough came in 1979 with the film "Série noire". In 1990, she had her first leading role in "Une nuit d'été en ville". Her second major role came in 1992 as "Betty", a bourgeois alcoholic. She also did theater work, notably "Le Retour", by Harold Pinter. Her last film, Janis et John (2003), was completed three months before her death.
biography.name: Marie Trintignant

biography.bio: Frédéric van den Driessche is an actor and writer, known for A Tale of Winter (1992), The Exterminating Angels (2006) and Louis Page (1997).
biography.name: Frédéric van den Driessche

biography.bio: Marc Chapiteau was born on August 17, 1946 in France as Marc-Ludovic Chapiteau. He is an actor and director, known for La Vie en Rose (2007), Je te mangerais (2009) and La meilleure façon de marcher (1976).
biography.name: Marc Chapiteau

biography.bio: Maxime Leroux was born on March 26, 1951 in Sainte-Adresse, Seine-Inférieure [now Seine-Maritime], France as Maxime Noël Michel Leroux. He was an actor, known for Camille Claudel (1988), Colonel Chabert (1994) and Mama, There's a Man in Your Bed (1989). He died on January 24, 2010 in Rouen, Seine-Maritime, Haute-Normandie, France.
biography.name: Maxime Leroux

biography.bio: Hervé Bellon is an actor, known for The Miser (1980), William the Conqueror (1982) and Le cygne (1972).
biography.name: Hervé Bellon

biography.bio: Philippe Cotten is an actor, known for Cravate club (2002), Le capital (2012) and Les randonneurs (1997).
biography.name: Philippe Cotten

biography.bio: Emmanuel Curtil was born on February 7, 1971 in Charenton-le-Pont, Val-de-Marne, France. He is an actor, known for The Jungle Bunch: The Movie (2011), Les misérables (1982) and La petite fille modèle (1985).
biography.name: Emmanuel Curtil

biography.bio: Patrice Dozier is an actor, known for Ernest & Celestine (2012), Le maître d'école (1981) and Robinson et compagnie (1991).
biography.name: Patrice Dozier

biography.bio: Jean-Michel Dupuis was born on February 2, 1955. He is an actor, known for The Party (1980), La controverse de Valladolid (1992) and Pris au piège (1993).
biography.name: Jean-Michel Dupuis

biography.bio: Paule Emanuele was born on May 14, 1927 in Fontenay-aux-roses, France. She is an actress, known for The Soft Skin (1964), Shame of the Jungle (1975) and Astérix et le coup du menhir (1989). She was previously married to Jean-Claude Michel.
biography.name: Paule Emanuele

biography.bio: Sébastien Fromanger is an actor, known for Porteur d'hommes (2010), Lautrec (1998) and Joseph et la fille (2010).
biography.name: Sébastien Fromanger

biography.bio: Bô Geste is a composer and actor, known for Les Lapins Crétins: Invasion (2013), La cité de la peur (1994) and Corto Maltese: La cour secrète des Arcanes (2002).
biography.name: Bô Geste
